text: I guess it isn't a physical issue where the sample is hitting the edge of the chamber in a certain position and so the tile goes out-of-focus. However, in answer to my own comment, I'm not sure how it would go out-of-focus, as the illumination/detection geometry/positioning remains the same - it's only the sample that moves, right?
